thread.title: Steve Jobs stars Fassbender, Winslet close London Film Festival
thread.title_full: Steve Jobs stars Fassbender, Winslet close London Film Festival

title: Steve Jobs stars Fassbender, Winslet close London Film Festival
text:
Steve Jobs stars Fassbender, Winslet close London Film Festival London 
London The latest biopic on Apple co-founder Steve Jobs closed the London Film Festival on Sunday, with stars Michael Fassbender and Kate Winslet walking the red carpet for the movie's European premiere. 
"Macbeth" actor Fassbender plays the Silicon Valley figure while Oscar winner Winslet portrays his colleague Joanna Hoffman in the film, called "Steve Jobs", which is based on the best-selling biography of Jobs by Walter Isaacson. 
"He was a visionary," Fassbender said. 
"I didn't know very much about the man before I started this project and yes - (I was) very inspired (by Jobs)."
